content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: STRAIN
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000175
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify variable STRAIN does not exist in DM dataset
Outcome:
  Message: STRAIN is present in DM dataset.
  Output Variables:
    - STRAIN
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0357
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: "The following variables can be used for non-clinical\
                  \ studies (SEND) but must NEVER be used in the Demographics domain\
                  \ for human clinical trials. However, the use of these variables\
                  \ is currently  being evaluated in Findings general observation\
                  \ class domains being developed for use in the  tabulations of virology\
                  \ data:\n  SPECIES (Demographics)\n  STRAIN (Demographics)\n  SBSTRAIN\
                  \ (Demographics)"
                Document: IG 3.4
                Section: '2.7'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Verify variable STRAIN does not exist in DM dataset

Outcome.Message: STRAIN is present in DM dataset.

Citations.Cited_Guidance:
The following variables can be used for non-clinical studies (SEND) but must NEVER be used in the Demographics domain for human clinical trials. However, the use of these variables is currently  being evaluated in Findings general observation class domains being developed for use in the  tabulations of virology data:
  SPECIES (Demographics)
  STRAIN (Demographics)
  SBSTRAIN (Demographics)
